channel.title: Remove King Guards, Create Blacksmith Class
channel.description:
The title is pretty self-explanatory and someone already suggested a Blacksmith class, but some people like to read class suggestions and it's fun anyways :stuck_out_tongue:
> # [color = "steblue"] The Blacksmith [/color] > **[color = "steblue"] Blue Dragon Support [/color]** > >**Lend Armor (Night ability)** - Make someone death immune for the night. Can target yourself twice. (Infinite uses)
This would also help Mastermind and death immune neutrals to fake claim armored.
